paper_abstract: This paper focuses on the Zigbee-based Internet of Things (IoTs) in 3D terrains. A novel simulation model for IoT is proposed. The effects of various terrains, node's mobility and traffic loads are investigated in this study. Many comprehensive studies are shown by comparing the simulations results from the packet delivery ratio, network goodput, average end-to-end delay and energy consumption metrics in different operation modes and traffic loads. (C) 2012 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Zigbee-based Internet of Things in 3D Terrains
